verses.text: \w Some|strong="H1697"\w* \w time|strong="H1961"\w* \w after|strong="H1961"\w* \w these|strong="H4428"\w* \w events|strong="H1697"\w*, \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w Jezreelite|strong="H3158"\w* owned \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w* next \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w palace|strong="H1964"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Ahab \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*.

\w So|strong="H4480"\w* Ahab \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w*, “\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w use|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w vegetable|strong="H3419"\w* \w garden|strong="H1588"\w*, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w next|strong="H7138"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w its|strong="H5414"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w*—\w or|strong="H3701"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* prefer, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w its|strong="H5414"\w* \w value|strong="H5869"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3068"\w* \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* replied, “\w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w forbid|strong="H2486"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* fathers.”

\w So|strong="H5414"\w* Ahab \w went|strong="H5437"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*, \w sullen|strong="H5620"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* angry \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jezreelite|strong="H3158"\w* \w had|strong="H5414"\w* \w told|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, “\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* fathers.” \w He|strong="H1004"\w* \w lay|strong="H7901"\w* \w down|strong="H7901"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w bed|strong="H4296"\w*, \w turned|strong="H5437"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w away|strong="H5437"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w refused|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w*.

Soon \w his|strong="H1696"\w* \w wife|strong="H1696"\w* Jezebel \w came|strong="H7307"\w* \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*, “\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w so|strong="H2088"\w* \w sullen|strong="H5620"\w* \w that|strong="H2088"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* refuse \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w*?”

Ahab \w answered|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jezreelite|strong="H3158"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w told|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, ‘\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w wish|strong="H2655"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w another|strong="H3808"\w* \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w* \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w its|strong="H5414"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w*.’ \w And|strong="H3701"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w replied|strong="H1696"\w*, ‘\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*!’”

\w But|strong="H6258"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* wife Jezebel said \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, “\w Do|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* \w reign|strong="H6213"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? \w Get|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* some \w food|strong="H3899"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* \w cheerful|strong="H3190"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w get|strong="H6965"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jezreelite|strong="H3158"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H7971"\w* Jezebel \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* \w letters|strong="H5612"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* Ahab’s \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w sealed|strong="H2856"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w seal|strong="H2368"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w nobles|strong="H2715"\w* \w who|strong="H3427"\w* \w lived|strong="H3427"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

\w In|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w letters|strong="H5612"\w* \w she|strong="H7121"\w* \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w*: “\w Proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w fast|strong="H6685"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* give \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w seat|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* honor \w among|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w But|strong="H5749"\w* \w seat|strong="H3427"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w scoundrels|strong="H1121"\w* \w opposite|strong="H5048"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H3318"\w* \w testify|strong="H5749"\w*, ‘\w You|strong="H1288"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w cursed|strong="H1288"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w* God \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1288"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*!’ \w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w take|strong="H3318"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w stone|strong="H5619"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w nobles|strong="H2715"\w* \w who|strong="H3427"\w* \w lived|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* Naboth’s \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* Jezebel \w had|strong="H3427"\w* instructed \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w letters|strong="H5612"\w* \w she|strong="H5892"\w* \w had|strong="H3427"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5971"\w* \w proclaimed|strong="H7121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w fast|strong="H6685"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w gave|strong="H7121"\w* \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w seat|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* honor \w among|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1288"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w scoundrels|strong="H1121"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w opposite|strong="H5048"\w* \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w these|strong="H8147"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w testified|strong="H5749"\w* \w against|strong="H5048"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w* \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w the|strong="H1288"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, saying, “\w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* \w has|strong="H4428"\w* \w cursed|strong="H1288"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w* God \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1288"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*!” \w So|strong="H3318"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w took|strong="H3318"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w* \w outside|strong="H2351"\w* \w the|strong="H1288"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w stoned|strong="H5619"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H7971"\w* they \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* word \w to|strong="H4191"\w* Jezebel: “\w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* has been \w stoned|strong="H5619"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.”

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* Jezebel \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w stoned|strong="H5619"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*, \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* Ahab, “\w Get|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w take|strong="H3423"\w* \w possession|strong="H3423"\w* \w of|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w* \w of|strong="H4191"\w* \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Jezreelite|strong="H3158"\w*, \w who|strong="H3588"\w* \w refused|strong="H3985"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* \w is|strong="H3701"\w* \w no|strong="H5414"\w* longer \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* Ahab \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w went|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w take|strong="H3423"\w* \w possession|strong="H3423"\w* \w of|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w* \w of|strong="H4191"\w* \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Jezreelite|strong="H3158"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Elijah \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Tishbite|strong="H8664"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*,

“\w Get|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w go|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* Ahab \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w who|strong="H3478"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*. \w See|strong="H2009"\w*, \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3423"\w* \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w*, \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w has|strong="H3478"\w* \w gone|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w take|strong="H3423"\w* \w possession|strong="H3423"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w it|strong="H3381"\w*.

\w Tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H1571"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w Have|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H1696"\w* \w not|strong="H1696"\w* \w murdered|strong="H7523"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man \w and|strong="H3068"\w* seized \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w land|strong="H4725"\w*?’ \w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H1571"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w where|strong="H4725"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w dogs|strong="H3611"\w* \w licked|strong="H3952"\w* \w up|strong="H3952"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w*, \w there|strong="H3541"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w dogs|strong="H3611"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w lick|strong="H3952"\w* \w up|strong="H3952"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*—\w yes|strong="H1571"\w*, yours!’”

\w When|strong="H6213"\w* Elijah arrived, Ahab said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w*, “\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w* \w out|strong="H4672"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* enemy.” \w He|strong="H6213"\w* replied, “\w I|strong="H3282"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w out|strong="H4672"\w* \w because|strong="H3282"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* \w yourself|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w This|strong="H3478"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w what|strong="H7451"\w* \w the|strong="H3772"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* says: ‘\w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w bring|strong="H7451"\w* \w calamity|strong="H7451"\w* \w on|strong="H7451"\w* \w you|strong="H5800"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w consume|strong="H1197"\w* \w your|strong="H3772"\w* descendants; \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w from|strong="H3772"\w* Ahab \w every|strong="H8366"\w* \w male|strong="H8366"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, both slave \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w free|strong="H5800"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nebat|strong="H5028"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Baasha|strong="H1201"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahijah, \w because|strong="H2398"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w provoked|strong="H3707"\w* \w My|strong="H5414"\w* \w anger|strong="H3707"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w caused|strong="H5414"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*.’

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w speaks|strong="H1696"\w* \w concerning|strong="H3068"\w* Jezebel: ‘\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w dogs|strong="H3611"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* devour Jezebel \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w wall|strong="H3157"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*.’
